subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Fernando Alonso drove his Ferrari from pole to checkered flag to win the Singapore Grand Prix on Sunday, taking his fourth victory of the season, his second in a row and the 25th of his career.
snippet: Fernando Alonso drove his Ferrari from pole to checkered flag to win the Singapore Grand Prix on Sunday, taking his fourth victory of the season, his second in a row and the 25th of his career.
